movie_title: The Perks of Being a Wallflower
review: I've enjoyed watching the movie. It has many meaningful meanings in it. The quotes were great. Their acting was great also.

movie_title: Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them
review: Since I am a harry potter fan, this movie made me so happy watching it. I can't wait for the second part to come out. The acting of the main actors was amazing!

title: flattering
review: One of the best animated movie I've ever seen! Good job Disney. Seeking for more similar movies in the future :D

title: OVERRATED !
review: One of the worst movies I've seen in my entire life. I've wasted my time and I regret watching it!
